Text:
Thanks shirleyj002,

Quality is fine ...

Video Codec ...........: DivX 3 Low-Motion
Frame Size ............: 608x304  [=2.000]
FPS ...................: 23.976
Video Bitrate .........: 842 kb/s
Bits per Pixel ........: 0.190 bpp

Audio Codec ...........: 0x0055 MPEG-1 Layer 3
Sample Rate ...........: 48000 Hz
Audio bitrate .........: 192 kb/s [2 channel(s)] CBR audio
Interleave ............: 42 ms
No. of audio streams ..: 1

No texted language included. ;)

I beg to differ: The audio & video quality is average at best. What's worse, the aspect ratio is visibly wrong (2:1 rather than 2.35:1), and everybody looks egg-headed. Better get yourself an ISO and do your own rip.
